vendor_name: HS HOTSSON Hotel GDL Country Club
title: Trendy Mexican Country Club Retreat Adjacent to Lush Golf Course
description: Escape to Mexico’s second-largest and trendiest metropolis, Guadalajara, with a stay at the HS HOTSSON Hotel GDL Country Club. The resort rests on the edge of a lush golf course and provides the perfect launchpad to uncover the spectacular culture that drives this city. Explore contemporary Mexican cuisine at the onsite fine dining restaurant Los Vitrales, or take in views of the city with a tequila or exquisite cocktail in hand at the Lobby Bar and terrace.
location_description: HS HOTSSON Hotel Guadalajara Country Club
offer_address: Av. de las Américas 1526  Country Club C.P. 44610 Guadalajara, Jalisco, Mexico

title: Mexico Old-World Suites in Historic Guadalajara
description:
Old-world luxury and modern Mexican style blend effortlessly at Quinta Real Guadalajara, offering guests a unique chance to experience Jalisco hospitality at its finest. The hotel combines the state’s centuries of tradition with a fresh, avant-garde approach, to provide guests with an escape like no other. Each room is appointed with fine art, opulent furniture and views of the statue-ringed gardens below. Sip margaritas at the hotel’s elegant cocktail bar, swim in style in the hotel’s glorious stone pool and savour visits to Tierra Mia, a sophisticated fine dining restaurant celebrating vibrant and vivid Mexican flavours.

When you’re ready to explore Guadalajara, Mexico’s second-largest city, you’ll be perfectly placed. Take a day trip to the golden sands and cerulean lagoons of Puerto Vallarta, or explore the city’s rich cultural offerings, including a wealth of museums and galleries, fountains and public parks. It’s also the perfect place to enjoy traditional mariachi music or witness the bull-riding spectacle of the charrería.
offer_address: Av. México No. 2727 Col. Vallarta Norte
